data.content:
Keep an eye out this Halloween 

@NASAWebb and @NASAHubble just unveiled this pair of colliding galaxies that are absolutely, definitely not staring into your soul. Stick around today as we share ghoulish glee from across NASA! https://t.co/BKyUGMMfny https://t.co/upmfnNvOEH

SpaceX Will Launch Starlink Satellites from Florida

data.content:
Every November, we observe #NativeAmericanHeritageMonth by celebrating our Native American colleagues at NASA.
 
Join us as we uplift and support their voices and work to foster a more inclusive and equitable workplace. https://t.co/bqmHJHoC4d https://t.co/mS9GhpCArM

Get Far Out with us!

Our new NASA+ series takes you behind the scenes of some of the most extraordinary parts of NASA. First up? The wild side of @NASAKennedy: https://t.co/tnNb8mixAU https://t.co/nPINaAZcAI

old_updates.data: NASA panel calls on SpaceX to “maintain focus” on Dragon safety after recent anomalies
Chinese launch startup Cosmoleap secures funding for rocket featuring chopstick recovery system

data.content: Space is closer than you think: apply now to the ESA Student Internship Programme https://t.co/5jipCAsCUY #ESArecruits https://t.co/2qBRysx8sV

A @SpaceX spacecraft, laden with science, supplies, and shellfish (astronauts deserve holiday treats, too)  is set to launch to the @Space_Station on Nov. 4.
 
Watch our live coverage starting at 9:10pm ET (0210 UTC Nov. 5): https://t.co/Mf7IInEdK4 https://t.co/Acam6Fp5cm

old_updates.data: Lockheed Martin completes acquisition of smallsat manufacturer Terran Orbital

data.content: This week's @ESA_EO #EarthFromSpace is an icy landscape of Ross Island in Antarctica as seen by @CopernicusEU #Sentinel2 on 3 February 2024. https://t.co/aTV8yClCs7

The colours of these two galaxies are due to a mix of infrared light from the NASA/ESA/CSA James Webb  Space Telescope and visible and ultraviolet light from the NASA/ESA Hubble Space Telescope. https://t.co/Rd62E8L6pu
Ever wondered why the International @Space_Station (ISS) is considered one of humanitys greatest achievements? Discover five facts about the ISS.  https://t.co/nyMLvb7ck7

In a new vlog, CSA astronaut @astro_jeremy shares an incredibly humbling experience that he went through recently with our friends from the Turtle Lodge in Manitoba who welcomed him with loving hearts. Watch now : https://t.co/N0BD80PFzc https://t.co/doWJwWTwLE

Get ready to reach for the stars!Our new mission shirts are now available at @IngeniumCA. Join @astro_Jeremy and @astro_kutryk on these out-of-this-world journeys. https://t.co/PKNG57MD3Z https://t.co/5yfRADmgzF

Our @EuropaClipper, Deep Space Optical Communications, and Advanced Composites Solar Sail System are named among the #TIMEBestInventions of 2024!
 
Learn more about how our work is helping build the future: https://t.co/wMKWcrynrZ https://t.co/qllzzCIF9R

When to look up in November 

Look out for Jupiter, Saturn, and Mars in the night sky throughout the month. If you live in the eastern half of the U.S. or Canada, you might be able to see a stellar lunar eventan occultationwhen the Moon hides a bright star! https://t.co/NAQm7E3HS1
